title: It's too hard to kill LeBlanc
body: She has 2 dashes at level 6 that can blink back almost immediately. When low, she goes invis and gets a clone. She's harder to gank than an Akali. Please do something about this. Also, her chain is kinda op; that tether range lul.

Why is that shit in the game?

>  When low, she goes invis and gets a clone.

I personally am opposed fully to passive effects that act as a get-out-of-death-free card. LeBanc's invis, Anivia's egg, Aatrox's blood resurrection, etc. 

Death-avoiding skills should be activateable, require timing and active use, not passive effects that just let you brainlessly go ham.

I disagree on Anivia.

Anivia's passive is not a get out of death free card. Several seconds of complete uselessness while also taking negative resistances.

all you have to do is auto and kite to be right on top of her when she comes out of egg form most Mages have poke  spells with a 6-4 second cooldown with early 10% cdr its beyond easy to get damage back before anivia comes out of egg form and with just autos its easy to get anivia in kill range if after she revives if your spell comes up miliseconds after.

Lol is odd to me. I'd assume that the harder you are to kill the less kill potential that you have. Nope. Assassin's should be about securing kills and ganking. Assassin's shouldn't be solo monsters. Your team sets up the kill and you use your superior mobility to finish weakened targets. This game revolves around instantly killing the adc then running away which is why Champs like LeBlanc, kha, Talon, and Zedd exist. This makes for an unfun game.
